Why distribute your data through VizieR?

Image 1 of 1: ‘Screenshot: VizieR Catalogue collection page, example for 'mission:gaia', from July 2023’

Figure 2

Image 1 of 1: ‘Figure: VizieR and the interoperability with the CDS services. The full list of services is described just above.’

FAIR principles for astronomical data

Figure 1

Image 1 of 1: ‘Figure -- Summary data journey from a publication to VizieR and then EOSC: beginning of the journey - step data published in a refereed paper’

Figure 2

Image 1 of 1: ‘Findable Accessible Interoperable Reusable principles cartoon from 'Open Science Training Handbook'’

Credit: Open Science Training Handbook, CC0 1.0 Universal, https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1212496

Figure 3

Image 1 of 1: ‘Small extract of Table 8 from VizieR catalogue J/ApJS/261/19, displaying 4 columns for the effective temperature: TeffR, TeffS, TeffP and Teff, the latter one corresponding to their adopted temperature’

Submission routes and journals

Preparing your data

Image 1 of 1: ‘Figure -- Summary data journey from a publication to VizieR and then EOSC: second step of the journey - step preparation of the data, right after - step data published in a refereed paper’

Image 1 of 1: ‘Screenshot: Example of a VizieR table ingested. The figure shows the first 20 rows for the table 'I/355/gaiadr3'.’

Image 1 of 1: ‘Screenshot: Example of spectra ingested and available through the Saada VizieR page, associated with the catalogue 'J/A+A/589/A36'. ’

Submitting astronomical data

Image 1 of 1: ‘Figure -- Summary data journey from a publication to VizieR and then EOSC: third step of the journey - step submission of the data, right after - step data published in a refereed paper, step preparation of the data’

Image 1 of 1: ‘Screenshot: ReadMe Generator Python library Github page, from July 2023’

Figure 3

Image 1 of 1: ‘Screenshot: VizieR Catalogue upload page, start uploading Tables after initiating a session, from June 2023’

Figure 4

Image 1 of 1: ‘Screenshot: VizieR Catalogue upload page, fill the ReadMe file after initiating a session and uploading your tables, from June 2023’

Figure 5

Image 1 of 1: ‘Screenshot: VizieR Catalogue upload page, upload associated data: FITS Spectra and Time Series after initiating a session, uploading your tables and filling the ReadMe file, from June 2023’

Figure 6

Image 1 of 1: ‘Screenshot: VizieR Catalogue upload page, upload associated data: FITS Images after initiating a session, uploading your tables, filling the ReadMe file and uploading FITS Spectra and Time Series, from June 2023’

Figure 7

Image 1 of 1: ‘Screenshot: VizieR Catalogue upload page, validate your submission after initiating a session, uploading your tables, filling the ReadMe file and uploading FITS Spectra / Time Series and FITS images, from June 2023’

Data curation at CDS

Figure 1

Image 1 of 1: ‘Figure -- Summary data journey from a publication to VizieR and then EOSC: fourth step of the journey - step curation and verification of the data, right after - step data published in a refereed paper, step preparation of the data, step submission of the data’

Image 1 of 1: ‘Screenshot -- Table with wrong units as displayed in paper’

Journey of your data in the VO and EOSC

Figure 1

Image 1 of 1: ‘Figure -- Summary data journey from a publication to VizieR and then EOSC: last step of the journey - step integration into the IVOA, EUDAT and finally EOSC, right after - step data published in a refereed paper, step preparation of the data, step submission of the data, steps curation and verification of the data’
